description:
In the magical kingdom of Alvera, magic is an eternally flowing life force, protected by witches since time immemorial. When a dark threat arises, a group of young witches known as the Guardians of Alvera must embark on an epic adventure to save their world. Led by Luna, a young witch with latent power, these heroines must face dangerous challenges, uncover ancient secrets, and unleash the true power of friendship and magic to restore light and hope to their home.

Key points
·Magical kingdom full of adventures
·Brave and charismatic heroines
·Epic fight against darkness
·The power of friendship and magic
·Exciting challenges and incredible spells
·Awesome battles and magical creatures
·Discover hidden powers
·Restoration of hope and light
·Explore ancient secrets and mysteries
·An epic journey that will keep you on the edge of your seat
name: Witch Guardians: Quest for the Ancestral Magic
intro: In the kingdom of Alvera, a group of young witches embark on an adventure to save their world from darkness. Discover the power of friendship and magic in this visual novel.
